title: What popular song do you secretly hate? - Quora

response.answer_text: I live in Japan, so I’m surrounded by pop music that I can’t stand. Don’t get me wrong—I love living in Japan. I even love a few Japanese pop singers. (Namie Amuro, why did you retire?! You’re awesome!) But anything by a massive girl-idol group whose performers (I won’t call them singers) were chosen solely for their youth and cuteness and not their talent is just going to grate on my nerves. Specific example: “Heavy Rotation” by AKB48  Note: The video is safe for work, but anybody looking over your shoulder will think you’re a pervert. It’s midway between looking at a lingerie catalog and straight-up porn. Also note that some of the girls in the video are underage. (And yes, I only watched the first 20 seconds of it just to make sure I was getting the right song.) But we’re talking about the song, not the video. If you’ve managed to listen to it, you’ll see how insipid the lyrics are. The singing is flat and childish—pretty standard with girl-group singers, as a “naive” sound is prized. (Yes, I know, it’s really creepy.) Now imagine this sound being blared out of half the shop PA systems all over your city, for two months straight. Now please don’t make the mistake of thinking I hate Japan, or Japanese music, or even Japanese pop music. I love living in Japan, and I love many, many things about Japan. I love lots of Japanese music. As for pop music, well hey, I hate most pop music of any nation, but there’s plenty of Japanese pop music that I enjoy. So as not to be negative, here are some good songs: “Do Me More” by Amie Namuro  (Youtube only has a 1-minute clip of the official video, sorry.) And “Sugar Water” by Cibo Matto  (OK, Cibo Matto isn’t exactly all the popular. Most of my students haven’t heard of them. But they’re awesome.)

What popular song do you secretly hate? Hate? That word seems so overused these days, in my opinion. Well, haha. Do you mean on what popular song don’t you like? It overall depends on your own humble opinion on what do you think on what are popular songs that you dislike, which means don’t like. But in my opinion? Umm, I personally wouldn’t say I hate these songs since they are just not my taste and I hope my own answer with my own opinion only doesn’t get banned and reported by Quora Moderation, but to be honest. The first song that I don’t like is. To be very honest, I really don’t Blackpink’s “Kill This Love” at all. I’m so sorry to all Blinks, but I just don’t like the song nor Blackpink at all. Blackpink just doesn’t appeal my taste for K-pop even though I love K-pop. In my humble opinion, I do love K-pop, but the reason why I don’t like the song ““Kill This Love” it’s because of the beat. Do I need to say anything more? But to be very honest, I really don’t like the beat of the song. I don’t know why, but I feel like that I personally find the K-pop song to be really annoying and cheesy overall. And plus, The lyrics don’t make any sense either since that K-pop song is still bland, boring, basic and overall and that’s why I’m not a fan of the song nor the group. But if you guys like the song, that’s cool with me. I can respect your taste as long if you respect mine back since I still don’t like the song. You know, Not everyone can like the same thing as you guys do since you can’t tell me to like Blackpink. Sure I still can see the appeal of Blackpink though, but I just don’t like them nor their music. Again, like I said, I’m so sorry to all Blinks, but I just don’t like it. Another popular song that I don’t like is pretty much all of Momoland’s music. In my opinion, I don’t know why, but Momoland just doesn’t fit for my taste of K-pop, in my opinion. Another reason on why I don’t like Momoland is because of their vocals. Do I really need to say something? I find their vocals to be very average overall to me, in my opinion. Even Blackpink has better vocals. I’m still not a Blink though, to be honest. And that was why on why I don’t like Momoland nor their songs. Sorry! Sure I can see the appeal of their music, but I just don’t like them. Its just my opinion though. Period! Not trying to hurt someone who likes Momoland though, which is why I don’t want my answer to get reported by Quora Moderation. Again, Anyways, Here are some 3 more popular songs that I just don’t like, in my opinion: Walk It Like I Talk It by Migos: One word: Annoying and overplayed. I Like It by Cardi B: In my opinion, This song is really annoying overall. I don’t know why is it played a lot though. Plus, Cardi herself is overall really annoying. To be honest, I don’t like how she acts durning interviews. She’s super annoying. Solo by Jennie Kim: One word: Overrated. So yeah, Those were some popular songs that I don’t like overall, in my opinion. Have a nice day! Yours and truly, ~Evelyn M. <3
